mapper.insert: insert into step(sid, sname, sday, eday, pid, fid, methodologyid, mid, detail) values (seq_sid.nextval, #{sname}, #{sday}, #{eday}, #{pid}, #{fid}, #{methodologyid}, #{mid}, #{detail})
mapper.select: select pid from step where sid=#{sid}
select ts.TSTATUS, ts.TSTATUSID, ts.COLOR from step s join TSTATUS ts on s.METHODOLOGYID = ts.METHODOLOGYID where sid=#{sid}
select * from step where sid in (select sid from taskinstep where tid = #{tid})
